rows.label: tev031301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mikkal if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Mikkal what happened during the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Not all Ma-non are pleased that we're stranded on
on this backwater planet, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Still, at least none of them are starting revolts or
demonstrations or anything disruptive like that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0003
rows.name:
I can understand the ones who have families back on
our homeworld, but the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, honestly I don't understand how anyone could
leave a planet filled with so much pizza! Do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I just ate, and yet I'm already craving more?
So odd...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0009
rows.name:
...What's that? The cravings? Why, I'm craving another
hot slice of grenade pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0010
rows.name:
That slick layer of grease? That savory, stringy cheese?
It's about the most delicious thing ever, I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0011
rows.name:
How can a punch to the taste buds like that be legal?
You humans have stumbled onto something truly truly
truly incrediblllllrrr... Oh, darn. I'm drooling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I need to call Army Pizza right now and have them
make another delivery, understand? And I don't care
how many times they've already been out here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Did you know the Army Pizza owner took refuge on
our ship during the Ganglion attack?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0021
rows.name:
I figured that was my only shot to learn his secrets,
so I kind of asked him to...make a pizza right in front
of me? And boy, did he ever get mad![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Now that I think about it, the girl who usually delivers
the pizzas was nowhere in sight...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Maybe she was bringing pizza to soldiers on the
battlefield? If so, she has nerves of of steel.[ST:wait ]
